name: May & Yam
overview: May and Yam is a game I created in 1993 for the Amiga 500. It was never released anywhere, and I distributed it for free at computer parties. It was a homage to the game Pang!, which I loved around that time. Obviously, I couldn't reproduce the original, and I made many simplifications, such as substituting the rope by a tennis ball (not sure why I picked a tennis ball...) I didn't have enough time or skills to make everything by myself, so I even ended up ripping some music from other games, and art from here and there. So it's a bit of a collage.
